events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in several days, which is very frustrating.
The system has categorized this issue as a Delivery Delay case due to keywords like 'tracking' and 'hasn't arrived' in the customer message.
Support agent Maria has been assigned to this case to assist with the delayed delivery.
Hello! This is Maria from support. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to help you resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and the shipping address so that I can check the status with our shipping partner?
Sure! The order number is 458392 and the address is 1234 Elm Street, Springfield. Let me know if you need any other details.
I’ve reached out to the courier service and found out there was an unexpected delay at the local distribution center. Your package is scheduled to be delivered within the next 48 hours.
Thanks for the update! I appreciate you checking on it. I’ll wait for those two days and hope it arrives soon.
We have confirmed that your package was delivered today, as per the courier’s final confirmation. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure that you received your order in good condition and that everything is satisfactory.
Since you have confirmed receipt and satisfaction, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and feel free to contact us anytime.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your support experience. Your input helps us improve.
